name: Roger Charles DAY, Jr., petitioner, v. Donald J. TRUMP, President of the United States.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Roger Charles DAY, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Donald J. TRUMP, President of the United States.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Roger Charles DAY, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Donald J. TRUMP, President of the United States.
No. 17-7844.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 26, 2018.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
